DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectivity of Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection tn the treatment of acute ischemic stroke
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Effective Study of Ginkgolides Diterpene Lactone Meglumine Injection in the Treatment of Ischemic Stroke.
DOC.detailed_description: After randomized to 90 + 7 days mRS 0-1 points is the Primary Outcome Measure,evaluate the safety and effectivity of Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection tn the treatment of acute ischemic stroke
